definition: traditional one-month confinement period following childbirth/puerperium
moon/month/monthly/CL:個|个[ge4],輪|轮[lun2]
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to convalesce for a month following childbirth, following a special diet, and observing various taboos to protect the body from exposure to the "wind"
to complete the month of confinement following childbirth/cf 坐月子[zuo4 yue4 zi5]
morning sickness (in pregnancy)
puerperal fever

sentences.english: I feel son on the so-called disease has also died and more of the basic.
sentences.chinese: 我自己感覺所謂的月子病也基本不治而愈了。

sentences.english: As for rest and confinement should be the same.
sentences.chinese: 至於休養，應該和坐月子是一樣的。

sentences.english: In China and India, many new moms practice the tradition of postpartum confinementafter the birth of a child.
sentences.chinese: 在中國和印度，許多產婦媽媽都有坐月子的傳統。

sentences.english: There's a Chinese saying that goes "a woman in confinement should not be visited".
sentences.chinese: 中國有這樣一個說法，女人坐月子時是不能有訪客的。

sentences.english: But do you know whether the animals are in confinement or not?
sentences.chinese: 你是對的，但你知道動物產後是否也坐月子呢？

sentences.english: So people say that the most important confinement.
sentences.chinese: 所以別人都說坐月子最重要。

sentences.english: You are right. But do you know whether the animals are in confinement or not?
sentences.chinese: 你是對的，但你知道動物產後是否也坐月子呢？

sentences.english: I was in crib when I was just born.
sentences.chinese: 我月子裏是在小牀上睡的。

sentences.english: It is for the mother of a new-born child, perhaps.
sentences.chinese: 可能是給坐月子的女人買的。

sentences.english: "Sitting the month, " or zuo yuezi, is deeply embedded in Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 坐月子已經深深地植入了中國的文化之中。

sentences.english: She brought me back to the village after the malaria was cured.
sentences.chinese: 治好瘧疾，過完月子後，就帶我回了農村。
